Package fr.utt.lo02.projet.controller

Interface GameController

All Known Implementing Classes:
AdvancedShapeUpGameController, ShapeUpGameController
public interface GameController
Represent a game controller in the MVC pattern the controller is thus an entry point for the view that can calls its method

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void askChoice​(int choiceNumber, int choice)
    Ask the controller to choose an action (move, place, end turn)
    void askMove​(int x, int y, int x2, int y2)
    Ask to move a card from (x,y) to (x2,y2)
    void askPlace​(int x, int y, int cardIndex)
    Ask to place the card at the index cardIndex (from the playerhand) to (x,y)
    void endGame()
    The request to end the current game
    void endRound()
    The request to end the current round
    void endTurn()
    The request to end the turn
    void play()
    The request to play an other turn

  • Method Details

    • askChoice

      void askChoice​(int choiceNumber, int choice)
      Ask the controller to choose an action (move, place, end turn)
      Parameters:
      choiceNumber - the number of the choice (1 if it's the first choice in a turn, 2 if it's the second one)
      choice - the actual choice of the player

    • askMove

      void askMove​(int x, int y, int x2, int y2)
      Ask to move a card from (x,y) to (x2,y2)
      Parameters:
      x - the card to move abscissa
      y - the card to move ordinate
      x2 - the move target abscissa
      y2 - the move target ordinate

    • askPlace

      void askPlace​(int x, int y, int cardIndex)
      Ask to place the card at the index cardIndex (from the playerhand) to (x,y)
      Parameters:
      x - the place target abscissa
      y - the place target ordinate
      cardIndex - the index in the player hand

    • endTurn

      void endTurn()
      The request to end the turn

    • play

      void play()
      The request to play an other turn

    • endRound

      void endRound()
      The request to end the current round

    • endGame

      void endGame()
      The request to end the current game
